page.title: 09Religion
page.content: There are two places or worship in the block, Llanllwch Church and Smyrna chapel. In this day and age there are some residents who do not attend a place of worship with any regularity, a few attend chapels or churches outside this block, while others attend the above named places or worship regularly, but who live outside the block. Llanllwch is a small well kept church of approximately 200 members. The average attendance on an ordinary Sunday is 70. The services are mainly English, with a little Welsh included, but once a month one communion service is entirely in Welsh.
